synopsis.text: Junior Badminton Champion, Nagisa Aragaki, struggles to cope with a humiliating defeat, turning her passion into a tool of terror for her high school badminton club. As the club's future hangs in the balance, hope arrives in the form of Kentarou Tachibana, an Olympic-level coach with a secret weapon: Ayano Hanesaki, the girl who once crushed Nagisa. However, Ayano, despite her exceptional talent, is reluctant to engage in the sport she once dominated. As Nagisa grapples with her insecurities and Ayano with her aversion to badminton, the two must navigate their complex emotions and work together under Coach Tachibana's guidance to restore the glory of their high school badminton club. Will they rise above their fears and reservations to rediscover their love for the game? Join Nagisa, Ayano, and their team as they embark on a thrilling journey of self-discovery, rivalry, and friendship in the world of badminton.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
